root: ^Well done, Nigiri. You truly are the strongest one out of us all.
^I truly wish things didn't turn out the way they did, but hey, what can you do?
^Make the best out of the hand you've been dealt.
^Staying positive, even in the toughest times, was something he excelled at.
^I'd give up anything just to have one more day with him, the four of us together...
